data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Bo-Wen, Wu, San-An (2018): Are the monophlebid genera Drosichoides Morrison and Buchnericoccus Reyne synonyms? (Hemiptera, Coccomorpha, Monophlebidae). Zootaxa 4497 (2): 285-294, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4497.2.8|2 occurrences
